items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: DeliverEase is a lightweight, interactive web app designed to simulate real-time package delivery tracking using geolocation and routing features. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the OpenStreetMap API, it visually maps delivery progress from source to destination.
items.title: Anish-Tripathi/DeliverEase: DeliverEase is a lightweight, interactive web app designed to simulate real-time package delivery tracking using geolocation and routing features. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the OpenStreetMap API, it visually maps delivery progress from source to destination.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight, Dockerized FastAPI service for monitoring ERC‑20 token transfer volumes on Ethereum and sending threshold‑based alerts via Slack, Discord, email, or Telegram.
items.title: diegogalmarini/tokenwatcher-cloud: A lightweight, Dockerized FastAPI service for monitoring ERC‑20 token transfer volumes on Ethereum and sending threshold‑based alerts via Slack, Discord, email, or Telegram.

items.content_html: webfunny是一款轻量级的前端性能监控和埋点系统，私有化部署，简单易用。Webfunny is a lightweight front-end performance monitoring system and a burying point system, which is privatized and easy to use.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js API that scrapes IMDb to fetch movie, series, or TV show details using Express, Axios, and Cheerio. This API allows you to search for titles and retrieve detailed metadata such as rating, plot, genres, cast, and more.
items.title: milancodess/IMDb-Scraper-API: A lightweight Node.js API that scrapes IMDb to fetch movie, series, or TV show details using Express, Axios, and Cheerio. This API allows you to search for titles and retrieve detailed metadata such as rating, plot, genres, cast, and more.

items.content_html: Open a file dialog on Linux with ease using open-linux-file-dialog. This lightweight tool supports multiple dialog backends and requires no additional dependencies. 🐙✨
items.title: hogurtu/open-linux-file-dialog: Open a file dialog on Linux with ease using open-linux-file-dialog. This lightweight tool supports multiple dialog backends and requires no additional dependencies. 🐙✨

items.content_html: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟
items.title: AmaanMultani/lite-debounce-js: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟
